mapper.insert: INSERT INTO music(music_id, music_title, music_play_time, music_description, music_play_count, category_id, member_id) VALUES (#{id}, #{title}, #{playTime}, #{description}, #{playCount}, #{categoryId}, #{memberId});
mapper.update: UPDATE music SET music_title = #{title}, music_play_time = #{playTime}, music_description = #{description}, music_download_flag = #{downloadFlag}, music_visibility_flag = #{visibilityFlag}, music_play_count = #{playCount}, category_id = #{categoryId}, member_id = #{memberId} WHERE music_id = #{id}
